changelog.zh:
- 修复：ExoPlayer 无法识别流格式的问题，正确配置 HLS/DASH 支持
- 修复：HTTP 302 重定向无法播放的问题，手动解析重定向地址
- 新增：全局重定向缓存服务，减少重复网络请求，提升播放速度
- 优化：重定向缓存 24 小时有效期，刷新/删除播放列表时自动清除
- 修复：手机端切换频道时偶现黑屏的问题
- 优化：播放器资源释放机制，确保切换频道流畅
changelog.en:
- Fixed: ExoPlayer stream format recognition issue, properly configured HLS/DASH support
- Fixed: HTTP 302 redirect playback issue, manually resolve redirect URLs
- Added: Global redirect cache service to reduce network requests and improve playback speed
- Optimized: Redirect cache with 24-hour expiry, auto-clear on playlist refresh/delete
- Fixed: Occasional black screen when switching channels on mobile
- Optimized: Player resource release mechanism for smooth channel switching
